description: Includes a 5% census quiz (weeks 1-2) and eight 1% weekly pre-lecture quizzes (weeks 2-10). Requires perfect score on one attempt for weekly quizzes.
Calculation-based written assignment assessing materials from weeks 7-10. Submitted physically to designated box.
2-hour closed-book exam covering weeks 1-5 and 7-10. Hurdle requirement: >40% needed to pass course.
1-hour closed-book quiz during week 7 workshop, assessing materials from weeks 1-5.
